alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:54PM CDT until April 05 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Caldwell County in south central Texas... Northeastern Guadalupe County in south central Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1054 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Geronimo, or near Seguin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Kyle, Seguin, Lockhart, Martindale, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Kingsbury, Niederwald, Staples, Fentress, Geronimo, Maxwell, Reedville, Lytton Springs, Dale, St John Colony, Mendoza and Redwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
